alert.note: Alert for Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued February 23 at 8:37AM PST until February 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 37 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Santa Clara Valley, including San Jose. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will be hazardous to unsheltered or marginally sheltered populations, kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
